name: Retroa Retroa Builda
description:
Welcome Modern gamer, think your good at games do you? 

Yes! Then let me throw you a challenge.

Let me introduce you to the 80's platformer, yeah I know, "WHAT! am I looking at". Your saying to yourself, hang on thou, don't judge a book by its cover. These old games had challenge in abundance. Well maybe not my levels but I tried my best.

Just collect all the flashing items and get to the exit, through 20 levels, sound easy? 

Well, if it does turnout to be easy, why not challenge yourself to make better levels. Using the built in level editor. And show me, your perfect 20 levels. Not that my levels are perfect, but they're my current perfect 20. 

So what's your perfect 20?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls:

Left arrow key         -     Move left.

Right arrow key      -     Move right.

Spacebar                     -     Jump, Swim and will start the game.

Control Tips: 

Pressing both left and right keys - Stop's player character on ice and conveyors, to allow jumping straight up. 

Holding Spacebar - will activate swimming if jumping up into water, on reaching top of jump, dropping into water. Jump out of water when swimming against a solid block. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Demo available - Demo build is an older version than the Retail version. Includes one playable tutorial level, and one user created level available.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Retail Game Includes:

Play levels Selector:  ( Opens after completion of all 20 game levels )

  • Play levels 1 - 20 ( Choose one set only ), Plays through set of levels 1 - 20.
  • Play Random Levels ( Choose any combination of set's of levels ) Plays through all sets chosen at random.
  • Play Continuous Levels ( Choose any combination of set's of levels ) Plays through the sets one after the other.

Level Sets:

  • Game
  • User
  • Bonus ( locked until created, due to unforeseen circumstances ) 
  • Secret (  locked until created, due to unforeseen circumstances )

Level Editor: 

140 User Created Levels Available.

(Tutorials on how to use editor will come later, Please feel free to message me for help. Or shout out to the community.) 

Please note - my level 's may change over time.

Basic Music Creator:

Plays Selected Song When turned On, Lets you play and create your own music when turned off, use mouse to click on keys and slide across keys to play like a Stylophone, don't ask, lol.

Select a User Song slot on the left and press record, to create your own music, remember that F1 turns music off in game. This Sound is not to everyone's taste.

(Tutorials on how to use Music Creator will come later, Please feel free to message me for help. Or shout out to the community.) 

Game Difficulty:

  • Easy                   Lives 8, Time  -  3 : 20 (Approx.)
  • Normal            Lives 6, Time  -  2 : 55 (Approx.)
  • Hard                  Lives 4, Time  -  1 : 55 (Approx.)
  • Very Hard      Lives 3, Time  -  1 : 45 (Approx.)
  • Ninja                 Lives 2, Time  -  1 : 40 (Approx.)

Player Colours:

  • white
  • black     
  •  red
  • cyan
  • purple
  • green
  • blue 
  • yellow
  • orange
  • brown
  • light red
  • dark grey
  • grey
  • light green
  • light blue
  • light grey
